span.style: font-size:18; font-family:Comic Sans MS; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#550000
font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 v. 挫败： to prevent from being successful; defeat
【例】 foil her enemy by pulling some strings
【近】 baffle, balk, beat, checkmate, discomfit, frustrate, thwart
【反】 forward, foster, further, promote 帮助，促进
【记】 fail 使失败；有些近似 file(文件，锉刀),file 文件纸是薄的，锉刀类似剑；
【另】 trefoil 三叶形，quatrefoil 四叶的，foliage 树叶
